summary: Mission v9.4.8 - Vertical Reels-style scroll and minimal UI - ALL FEATURES VERIFIED. PartnersCarousel refactored with snap-y vertical scroll, 16:9 format, like button with CSS variables, profile photo overlay, and deep black background.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ PartnersCarousel.js: Complete refactor with snap-y snap-mandatory vertical scroll (Instagram/TikTok Reels style)
✅ Like button (HeartIcon) uses var(--primary-color, #D91CD2) for fill and glow
✅ Profile photo border uses var(--primary-color) and box-shadow uses var(--glow-color)
✅ Deep black background #000000 on partners section
✅ Vertical indicators on right side (4px width, 24px height when active)
✅ Video counter shows 'N / Total' format at bottom
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.4.8 fully verified. Key features: (1) PartnersCarousel uses snap-y snap-mandatory for vertical Reels-style scroll. (2) Video containers use 16:9 aspect ratio via aspectRatio CSS. (3) Like button toggles fill using --primary-color CSS variable. (4) Profile photo has border with --primary-color and glow with --glow-color. (5) Deep black #000000 background. (6) Vertical dots indicators on right (active=24px height). (7) Counter shows '1 / 5' format. (8) Click on partner navigates to /coach/{email}. Anti-regression: Chat widget purple, Bassi vitrine intact.

16_9_ASPECT_RATIO.verified_by: Playwright - aspectRatio property found on video containers

LIKE_BUTTON_CSS_VARIABLE.verified_by: Playwright - fill changes from 'none' to 'currentColor' on click

VERTICAL_INDICATORS.verified_by: Playwright - active dot index and height detected

PARTNER_CLICK_NAVIGATION.verified_by: Playwright - URL changed to /coach/contact.artboost@gmail.com after click
